params.vault: The address of the vault to check.

returns._0: True if the vault is verified, false otherwise.

name().details: Name should be unique and descriptive.

params.failEarly: Determines whether to fail early on the first error encountered or allow the verification to continue and report all errors.
params.vault: The address of the vault to verify.

returns._0: An array of addresses of verified vaults.

isVerified(address).notice: Checks if a vault is verified.

name().notice: Returns the name of the perspective.

perspectiveVerify(address,bool).notice: Verifies the properties of a vault.

verifiedArray().notice: Returns an array of all verified vault addresses.

verifiedLength().notice: Returns the number of verified vaults.
